about:
Hi Im just Passing in every few days to see how my good old Friends and are, And to see how the server is Goin! :)
Ive been on for about  1 year. I Love Avicus, But i  cant play on Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday and Friday due to School. >:(.  Well  My old friends are murph_the_cat Armored potato jellybean and tt :) Cya!... i live in a forest too :) dont belive me? read this!
